Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT COD_EMPRESA, FONTE, NRPROPOS, NRITEMRAMOFR
FROM seguros.v0autocober
 
where num_apolice    =  :NUM_APOLICE
  and nritem         =  :NRITEM
  and nrendos        =  :NRENDOS
  and ramofr         =  :RAMOFR
  and cod_cobertura  =  :COD_COBERTURA
  and situacao      <>  '2'
/
 END SQL
